mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_address(order_no, `name`, phone, addr1, addr2, memo) VALUES (#{order_no}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{memo})
mapper.sql: orderlist_no as orderlist_no, mem_id as mem_id, totprice, dstatus, waybill_num as waybill_num, parcel_cd as parcel_cd, DATE_FORMAT(regiDate,'%Y%m%d') as regiDateStr, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY regiDate desc) AS rownum, count(1) over() AS totalCount
mapper.select:
select t.* from ( select
from orderlist ) t where rownum BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*10*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10 order by rownum
